summary: This is an email chain from August 8, 2019, regarding a request for Jeffrey Epstein's Social Security Number (SSN). The email involves personnel from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, indicating internal communication about obtaining personal information on Epstein.

persons.name: Nicolas Roos
persons.context: Appears as a recipient of an email regarding a request for Jeffrey Epstein's Social Security Number, indicating involvement in internal communication about Epstein's case.

events.title: Email request for Epstein's SSN
events.description: An email chain within the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York regarding a request for Jeffrey Epstein's Social Security Number.

keyFacts: On August 8, 2019, there was internal email correspondence within the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York regarding obtaining Jeffrey Epstein's Social Security Number.
The email involves Nicolas Roos of the U.S. Attorney's Office, indicating legal personnel were seeking Epstein's personal identification information.
The timing of the request (August 8, 2019) is shortly after Epstein's arrest in July 2019 and before his death in August 2019, suggesting active case preparation.
